Rector-reeze.text-2: I sincerely congratulate you on joining the Impuls Medical Institute family! Today, you are starting an important and responsible path - the path of medicine, which is an honorable profession based not only on knowledge, but also on high values ​​such as humanity, patience and assistance.
Rector-reeze.text-3: In our institute, all conditions are created for you to receive high-level education, and with the help of a team of qualified professors with modern technologies and scientific achievements, you have the opportunity to study knowledge in depth. The education you receive here will not only enhance your professional experience, but also provide a solid foundation for your future path to helping people as a doctor.
Rector-reeze.text-4: Our goal is to develop the potential of each of you at a high level, and to form the necessary skills to become a leader in the field of medicine in the future. This path is not easy, but your hard work, patience and thirst for knowledge will lead you to success.
Rector-reeze.text-5: During your studies at our institute, you will not only gain knowledge and skills in the field of specialization, but also make friends, understand the importance of teamwork and help. The success of each of you is our success. I wish you great achievements, scientific research and fulfillment of your dreams in the new academic year. Join our institute and get ready to do great things!

About-us.text-1: Impuls Medical Institute is a leading private medical higher education institution that conducts modern education and scientific research in the field of medicine. The main goal of our institute is to train highly qualified personnel in the field of healthcare, provide medical education based on modern technologies and conduct scientific research.
About-us.text-2: Our History Impuls Medical Institute started its activity in 2022 as the first private medical institute in Namangan region. Our institute was established to solve the urgent problem of shortage of personnel in the field of medicine. It operates on the basis of license No. 047559 issued by the State Inspection of Education Quality under the Cabinet of Ministers of the Republic of Uzbekistan.
About-us.text-3: Our Educational Process Educational processes at our institute are based on the credit-module system, and the lessons are organized in a hybrid state. In our institute, the hybrid education system is an educational platform that helps students learn practical training together with the leading professors and teachers of Uzbekistan and the world and, in turn, help them learn independently. Video lessons are understood as a mutually integrated system with situational issues related to training.
About-us.text-4: Our Institute of Scientific Research and Innovation attaches great importance to scientific research activities. Our scientific research is mainly focused on current issues in the field of health care and directions for making medical education more effective. Our research focuses on developing new treatments, diagnostic technologies and medical education. We cooperate with foreign scientific centers and institutes to organize our scientific research based on international standards and offer practical solutions to medical science.
About-us.text-5: Our Values ​​Transparency: We prioritize openness and honesty in all our processes. We build trusting and transparent relationships with students, employees and partners.
About-us.text-6: Trustworthiness: We strive to fulfill the tasks entrusted to us responsibly. We strive to ensure honesty and reliability in everything we do.
About-us.text-7: Flexibility: We adapt quickly to the rapidly changing modern demands. We are open to accepting innovations and taking advantage of new opportunities.
About-us.text-8: Sustainability: We support continuous growth and improvement. We constantly strive to develop new knowledge and skills for our students and team.

Institut-history.text-1: The history of the opening of Impuls Medical Institute
Institut-history.text-2: In 2018, Impulse multidisciplinary private clinic was established in Norin district of Namangan region. The purpose of founding the clinic was to provide high-quality and modern medical care to patients. However, in the first period of the clinic's operation, the COVID-19 pandemic began, and it became a severe test for the whole world. Although the clinic was able to help many patients during the pandemic, unfortunately, due to lack of resources, it was not possible to help everyone.
Institut-history.text-3: During the pandemic, finding modern technologies, equipment and drugs required a lot of money. The biggest problem was the lack of qualified doctors. The shortage of medical personnel was a big problem not only for our clinic, but also for the whole of Uzbekistan. In such a situation, we realized that we should not only rely on existing specialists, but also take a step to develop the medical field.
Institut-history.text-4: Thus, in 2019, the idea of ​​opening our own medical institute was formed in order to train qualified medical personnel. We studied advanced education systems abroad, including medical education and healthcare systems in European, Asian and American countries. In which countries medicine is taught at the highest level, how the best quality care is provided to patients, what kind of education system they have - we analyzed everything.
Institut-history.text-5: As a result of the studies, we decided to open a medical institute that conforms to the American USMLE system. In order to achieve this goal, we have engaged and learned from qualified specialists.
Institut-history.text-6: Finally, in 2022, as a result of our several years of efforts, the first and only private medical institute in Namangan region - Impulse Medicine, based on license No. The institute was opened. Today, our institute is based on the modern medical education system and aims to train mature specialists in the field of medicine.

Scientific-council.text-1: The Scientific Council of the Impulse Medical Institute is the main collective body that resolves issues related to the scientific activity of the institute. The Scientific Council conducts its activities in accordance with the Law of the Republic of Uzbekistan No. 637 of September 23, 2020 On Education, Labor Code of the Republic of Uzbekistan No. 161-I, 1995 of the Republic of Uzbekistan According to the Law of the Republic of Uzbekistan dated December 21, 2019 No. 576 It operates in accordance with the Law On Science and Scientific Activity, as well as the Institute's Charter and other local normative legal documents. The Council also operates on the basis of the Institute's Statute On the Scientific Council and acts as an authorized body within the framework of the established legal documents.
Scientific-council.text-2: The main goal of the scientific council is to make collective decisions on all issues based on scientific activity at the institute and to develop scientific research.
Scientific-council.text-3: The activity of the scientific council is based on the principles of transparency, collective discussion and problem solving, and requires a responsible approach to the employees and students of the institute.
Scientific-council.text-4: The main tasks of the scientific council:
Scientific-council.text-5: Determining the main directions of the institute's scientific development; Legal and normative regulation of the main issues of organization of scientific activity; Development of scientific activity programs of the Institute and their implementation; Reviewing and making decisions on issues of scientific research and information-analytical activity; Approval of the plan of scientific research topics carried out by the institute; Approving work plans of the Scientific Council of the Institute;
Scientific-council.text-6: The Scientific Council of the Impulse Medical Institute plays an important role in the further development of the institute's scientific and research activities, aiming to achieve high scientific standards.

administration-institute.text-1: Department for scientific affairs and innovations
administration-institute.p-1: He is engaged in managing scientific research and grant projects, improving the qualifications of teachers and scientific staff, and increasing the rating of the institute.
administration-institute.text-2: Department for youth issues and spiritual and educational affairs
administration-institute.p-2: To support students and ensure their spiritual and moral development, manages student accommodation and sports activities.
administration-institute.p-3: Coordinates organization of educational processes, quality control and cooperation with teachers.
administration-institute.text-4: Education quality and quality control department
administration-institute.p-4: It evaluates the quality of the educational process, the pedagogical skills of teachers, the quality of tests and educational resources.
administration-institute.p-5: Develops international cooperation, attracts foreign students and manages international grants.
administration-institute.p-6: The Institute is engaged in advertising products and services, conducting market research and developing a marketing strategy.
administration-institute.p-7: Deals with budget planning, keeping financial accounts, monitoring expenses and income.
administration-institute.p-8: Manages procurement, inventory and logistics processes for materials and resources for the Institute.
administration-institute.p-9: Engages in employee recruitment, development and salary management.
administration-institute.p-10: He supervises all legal activities of the institute and develops legal documents.
administration-institute.p-12: The tasks of the Student Union include the following: Protecting the interests of students: Identifying student problems and discussing them with the management of the Institute. Organizing social and cultural events. Supporting clubs and organizations: organizing clubs and organizations that students are interested in. and support for their activities. Developing solidarity among students: conducting activities aimed at increasing friendship and cooperation among students.
administration-institute.p-13: Coordination and control of students' study process, storage and protection of their personal data, provision of qualified administrative services to students. Provision of services related to the study process to students through the system; Study process and providing students with information on electronic platforms (HEMIS, Moodle, LMS); Coordination of student dormitories and residences; Assistance to students in scientific and innovative activities display; Provide advice to professors-teachers about the systems; Organize the processes of admission, transfer, reinstatement and expulsion of students; provide information about supervisions; provide academic references and transcripts; provide student GPA (grade point average) information; process student IDs and residence documents; tracking and dealing with debt; helping students with rent subsidies.
administration-institute.p-14: Management of information resources: Management of all information resources of the Institute and ensuring their effective use. Management of library activities: Organization and supervision of daily activities of the library. Assistance to students and teachers: Information resources and library services to students and teachers. providing advice and support. Preparation of electronic educational materials: Preparation of electronic educational materials and multimedia resources and their quality control.

faq.question_1: When is the admission to the institute
faq.answer_1: Once a year, in July - September
faq.question_2: What documents are required for admission?
faq.answer_2: A valid passport or ID and an 11th grade certificate or college diploma are required to register for the exam. The rest of the documents will be submitted after the exam.
faq.answer_4: Yes, there is. In the entrance exam, a total of 50 questions will be asked from Biology, Chemistry, Mathematics, IQ.
faq.answer_5: The dates of the entrance exam will be notified to the applicants by SMS.
faq.answer_6: At the moment, only the line of treatment work
faq.question_7: What are the options for students who fail the entrance exam?
faq.answer_7: Prefoundation courses are available for applicants and applicants who have not scored sufficient marks in the institute's internal examinations
faq.question_8: What language will the lessons be in?
faq.answer_8: In English for foreign students and students with B1 English language certificate - In Uzbek for local students
faq.question_9: Is there a dormitory for students?
faq.answer_9: Yes, we currently have a dormitory that can accommodate more than 230 students.
faq.answer_10: A 100% grant for the semester will be awarded to the top 10% of students with the highest achievement and total assets in the community.
faq.question_11: How much is the contract fee?
faq.answer_11: The amount of the 1-semester contract for the 2024-2025 academic year is 16,500,000 soums.
faq.question_12: Is it possible to pay the contract in installments?
faq.answer_12: According to the institute's internal regulations, the amount of the contract for the annual academic year can be paid in 4 installments based on the contract.

qadriyatlarimiz.vision_p: Becoming a world-renowned, leading medical educational institution, combining modern medical knowledge and practice with advanced technologies, contributing to the improvement of public health
qadriyatlarimiz.mission_p: Development of medicine and medical education, thereby increasing the average life expectancy. Impul Medical Institute, based on its mission, respect for the most important values ​​of humanity - health and life. Integration of modern technologies into medical education and education based on international standards. To develop international cooperation and provide opportunities for students to study and practice abroad. This association aims to contribute to the extension of human life, as well as quality and fulfilling life, through the development of medicine and medical education.

docs.text-1: The State Inspectorate for Quality Control of Education under the Cabinet of Ministers of the Republic of Uzbekistan granted permission for Impuls BSR LLC to provide non-state educational services based on license No. 047559 dated November 9, 2022.
docs.text-2: Impuls Medical Institute started its activity on 09.11.2022 based on Impuls BSR LLC license No. 047559. The institute has the educational direction 60910200 - Therapeutic work, which includes a 6-year bachelor's degree. Graduates are awarded a general practitioner bachelor's degree.
docs.text-3: Currently, the institute has 6 departments, 110 professors and teachers, and more than 50 clinical practice bases operating on the basis of a contract.

xalqaro-xamkorlik.text: Impuls Medical Institute pays great attention to international cooperation. Our institute operates in order to establish and develop long-term cooperative relations with leading universities, scientific research centers and medical institutions from different countries. Within the framework of cooperation, scientific research, training programs, exchange of experience of students and professors are organized. We strive to ensure the quality of education in accordance with international standards, encouraging the global exchange of knowledge and innovation.

grand.text-1: Outstanding opportunity: 100% scholarships for high-achieving students:
grand.text-2: In order to give the students of Impulse Medical Institute stronger motivation every semester, 10% of the students are given 100% grants by the founders of the institute.
grand.text-3: These awards are determined at the end of each semester and the winning student is awarded a full grant by the institution. Seize the opportunity and step forward with your academic and practical achievements!
grand.text-4: The procedure for conducting grant examinations and calculating the grant results: 10% of students with the highest grant points in each semester will receive a 100% grant for the next semester.
grand.text-7: Membership in one or more clubs organized by the Student Union and active participation in these clubs;
grand.text-8: Participation in the Teacher assistant project
grand.text-9: Regular participation in any type of sport (mini football, table tennis, chess, checkers, basketball, volleyball, swimming, wrestling, boxing, etc.)
grand.text-10: Explanation: If one of the above 4 conditions is not met, the student will not be recommended for the grant.
grand.text-12: The average value of the results of the first attempt of the final control exams in special subjects - 40%
grand.text-13: The average value of the results of the first attempt of special subject tests conducted with the participation of examiners (independent work evaluations are not taken into account) - 20%
grand.text-15: Total scholarship points: Final exam (40%) + Midterm exam (20%) + Scholarship exam (40%) = 100%.
grand.text-16: If the student fails to appear for the first attempt exam for a valid reason, if a document confirming that the valid reason was present on the day of the exam is presented and this document is recognized as valid by the Department of Education Quality, the student's 2nd or 3rd attempt score (if the student fails to appear for the second attempt) is calculated by multiplying the percentage . In this case, 75% of the student's 2nd attempt score and 60% of the 3rd attempt score are added to the grant score. If the student does not appear for the 1st opportunity and cannot provide a valid reason, the student will not be awarded points for that exam when calculating the grant score.
grand.text-17: The scholarship exam is held at the end of the semester as a separate exam. In it, students take a test consisting of one (1st courses) or several (senior courses) blocks, each of which contains 40 questions. Tests include simple questions from specialized subjects and situational problems. A certain number of questions in each block (the same amount for the entire course) will be in English. 1 hour is allotted for each block.
